page.title: 14MEDIA
page.content: The{Fife Free Press}was started in {1871}by Mr.Strachan and Mr.Livingston. The offices are in Kirk Wynd but the paper is printed at Mitchelson Industrial Estate. The 7{reporters}employed by the paper find the news in several different ways.They go to local meetings;they go to the police court and they go to local events.Some freelance reporters and members of the public send in news stories. Although all the Fife Free Press {photographers}were freelance the paper now employs 1 full time photographer. {22000}newspapers are printed every week on a modern computer controlled printing press. The office at Kirk Wynd houses another paper called The{Fife {Leader.}This is a free newspaper which is paid for by advertising.
